response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $1,350,000. We look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your experience and contribute to your goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
